ygData.subject: Re: Suggestion from my mailbox....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Im doin exacly what you didnt like but I know no other way, hehe I too live in another time zone and I like helping out. so thats why I sometimes write
ygData.messageBody:
Well Im doin exacly what you didnt like but I know no other way, hehe
I too live in another time zone and I like helping out.
so thats why I sometimes write about 20 mails in a row,
Wich, when thinkin about it, is realy stupid.

Ill try to do it a different way.

Have the title of the mail read "Vashis words of wisdom" hehe

take care.

Vashi

>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>Im sorry. I am the main person doing this and Ill try to cut out one line
>non-sensical posts completely out. I will also begin to trim the giant
>emails as well. I will also check to see if someone has answered the
>question or made a comment I was going to make from now on.
>
>I think the main reason you will see lots of posts from me in a row is that
>I live in a different time zone. When you guys are asleep im at work
>reading the list. Therefore when you wake up in the morning you will see
>lots of emails from me.
>
>Thats not an excuse but one of the reasons why you will see a lot of emails
>from me in one chunk and then none for a 24 hour stint. Ill try and cut
>back, but I really like this list and perhaps I get to excited when
>replying
>:)
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
>http://www.onelist.com
>At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
